topic.title: Womens Health Patient Notification - conformance rules

section.p: This class captures information about notification.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Indicates the method used to notify the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
The date the notification was first created. It may be today's date or a date in the past. A future date cannot be associated with this record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateDue with data type Point In Time
The date that this notification will be considered delinquent or past due if it does not have a status of closed

Contains exactly one [1..1] datePrinted with data type Point In Time
The date on which this letter was or will be printed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateToPrint with data type Point In Time
The date on which this letter should be printed. This date can then be used for automatic printing. For "reminder" letters, the date to print would typically be based on the due date of the treatment need associated with the purpose for notification. For "results" letters, the date to print would typically be the date that the results are made available.
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id

Contains exactly one [1..1] outcomeOrResults with data type Code
The results or outcome, which may be a goal or an event, associated with this patient's notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] purpose with data type Code
Indicates the reason for the notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status for this notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] notifyingFacility, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The name of the health care facility that initiated and printed the letter or notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] category with data type Code
Indicates the method used to notify the patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
The date the notification was first created. It may be today's date or a date in the past. A future date cannot be associated with this record.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateDue with data type Point In Time
The date that this notification will be considered delinquent or past due if it does not have a status of closed

Contains exactly one [1..1] datePrinted with data type Point In Time
The date on which this letter was or will be printed.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateToPrint with data type Point In Time
The date on which this letter should be printed. This date can then be used for automatic printing. For "reminder" letters, the date to print would typically be based on the due date of the treatment need associated with the purpose for notification. For "results" letters, the date to print would typically be the date that the results are made available.
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Id

Contains exactly one [1..1] outcomeOrResults with data type Code
The results or outcome, which may be a goal or an event, associated with this patient's notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] purpose with data type Code
Indicates the reason for the notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
The status for this notification.

Contains exactly one [1..1] notifyingFacility, where its type is Service Delivery Location
The name of the health care facility that initiated and printed the letter or notification.
